x86x64::X86VarÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::X86Var
#include <x86defs.h>

Base class for all variables.

Public Functions

X86Var()

X86Var(const X86Var & other)

X86Var(const _NoInit &)

X86Var clone()

Clone X86Var operand.

void reset()

Reset X86Var operand.

uint32_t getRegType()

uint32_t getVarType()

bool isGp()

Get whether the variable is Gpb register.

bool isGpb()

Get whether the variable is Gpb register.

bool isGpbLo()

Get whether the variable is Gpb-lo register.

bool isGpbHi()

Get whether the variable is Gpb-hi register.

bool isGpw()

Get whether the variable is Gpw register.

bool isGpd()

Get whether the variable is Gpd register.

bool isGpq()

Get whether the variable is Gpq register.

bool isFp()

Get whether the variable is Fp register.

bool isMm()

Get whether the variable is Mm type.

bool isXmm()

Get whether the variable is Xmm type.

bool isYmm()

Get whether the variable is Ymm type.

Mem m(int32_t disp = 0)

Cast this variable to memory operand.

Note
Size of operand depends on native variable type, you can use other variants if you want specific one.

Mem m(const GpVar & index, uint32_t shift = 0, int32_t disp = 0)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.
